body: please i want this translated! it's so good
Runrun's part is honestly the best!  Followed by Binto, Hirota and Palco.

HOLYFUCKING SHIT THIS IS GREAT! This is like one of the most consistent doujins I have ever read, I didn't cringe in any of these parts whatsoever, and like wow this is just a very well handled doujin.
ALL GIRLY BOI-HOLES MUST BE DESTROYED
